title: skiasharp .net core razor pages
body:
Hi,
is it possible to use skiasharp to display images in a web api .net core, for example in razor pages ?
I haven't found any example of this.
in xamarin I use this:
```
xmlns:views="clr-namespace:SkiaSharp.Views.Forms;assembly=SkiaSharp.Views.Forms">
and 
<views:SKCanvasView
```
is there an equivalent for razor pages in a Web API MVC ?
